sentences.sContent: The town provides a wide choice of entertainment.
sentences.sCn: 该镇提供各式各样的娱乐活动。

sentences.sContent: There will be live entertainment (= performed then, not recorded ) throughout the day.
sentences.sCn: 现场表演将持续一整天。

sentences.sContent: The dolphins give good entertainment value (= a lot of amusement and interest ).
sentences.sCn: 海豚具有很高的娱乐价值。

sentences.sContent: ...The high fertility made a growing number of people flock to cities where there were lively entertainment quarters...
...retail and entertainment -especially when combined with improved infra structure for cyclists and public transit-makes them appeal to a more affluent demographic...
...As American research universities begin to resemble profit centers and entertainment complexes...

...and an exceptional work ethic have rarely hurled anyone as far as they have this former abused teenage mother from rural Mississippi who became one of the world's most successful entertainment icons and the first African-American female billionaire...
...It includes not only the large gardens built as entertainment venues for the royal family...

phrases.pCn: 娱乐周刊；娱乐周报；每周娱乐
运动休闲；文娱体育休闲

trans.tranCn: 娱乐， 文娱节目， 表演会； 招待， 款待， 请客
trans.tranOther: things such as films, television, performances etc that are intended to amuse or interest people
